## 

```{r}
# test HY with 1st-derivative using the values from paper 
 
ppr <- c(0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 3.5, 4.5, 5.5, 6.5) 
tpr <- c(1.3, 1.5, 1.7, 2) 
 
tbl <- sapply(ppr, function(x)  
    sapply(tpr, function(y) z.HallYarborough(pres.pr = x, temp.pr = y))) 
 
rownames(tbl) <- tpr 
colnames(tbl) <- ppr 
print(tbl) 
```
